content: this crochet pattern is available for free on my website or you can download it here as a print-optimized ad-free pdf for your convenience **difficulty ** easy **materials needed ** 4 5mm hook 150-180 yards #4 squid worsted in bryna or caroline or substitute with #3 bernat baby sport in color of choice yarn needle scissors **stitches used ** chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet bpsc = back post single_crochet bphdc = back post half_double_crochet **additional terms ** *picot * chain 2 slip_stitch back into first st *3dc cluster * yo insert hook into stitch pull up a loop yo draw through 2 loops 1st stitch of cluster made yo insert hook into same st pull up a loop yo draw through 2 loops 2nd st of cluster made yo insert hook into same st pull up a loop yo draw through 2 loops 3rd st of cluster made yo draw through all loops on hook st/sts = stitch/stitches space/sps = space/spaces skip = skip **measurements ** adult 84 sts 10 wide by 7 3/4 tall child 76 sts 9 1/2 wide by 7 tall toddler 72 sts 9 wide by 6 1/4 tall 12 mos 68 sts 8 1/2 wide by 5 1/2 tall **gauge ** measures 6 1/4 across after round 9 16 half_double_crochet in 4 **additional notes ** -chain 1 at beginning of round does not count as a stitch -this hat is worked in multiples of 4 -substitute the #4 hand-dyed yarn with #3 bernat baby sport if you wish they have a nearly identical gauge
